message.content:
1. Drugs were administered after tourniquet application.
2. Occlusion was released after 1 minute.
3. 1/4th of the total dose of propofol was administered.
4. The total dose of propofol is 2 mg/kg.
5. The rate of propofol administration was 0.5 ml/s.

messages.content:
Statement: Drugs were administered after tourniquet application and occlusion was released after 1 min and 1/4th of the total dose of propofol (2 mg/kg) was administered at the rate of 0.5 ml/s.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
